attributes.action: Ban George Michael from opening Wembley Stadium - invite Peart Jam instead
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: George Michael has been scheduled to be the first performer at the new Wmbley Stadium. However, his music is a bit rubbish and a truly great stadium needs a truly great music act to mark it's opening - there is only one band worthy of this status: Pearl Jam.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
